about_the_game:
An arcade bundle by CWDI GAMES. Includes three arcade games; Chaos, Meteor Storm, and Monster Truck Transport.

Chaos


Not your typical breakout clone. The ball, paddle, and bricks are controlled by physics. Random power ups will fall from time to time which can affect gameplay. Points are gained by catching falling bricks with the paddle; avoid catching the skull and crossbones. Don't drop the ball!

In game music by RedWineProductions and Marc Corominas(MUSIC LIBRARY FILES).

Use the mouse to control the paddle. After all lives are lost pressing the space key will restart the game. Pressing the escape key takes you back to the menu. Pressing the escape key at the menu exits the game.

Meteor Storm


A meteor storm has been spotted moving toward your colony. Man the laser turret and protect the destructible buildings from space rocks! How long can you last?

Use the mouse to point the turret. Pressing the left mouse button fires the laser. Holding the left mouse button down too long causes the laser to over heat. Pressing the escape key returns to the menu.

Monster Truck Transport


Drive a big truck. Find and collect the crate and deliver it to the checkered flag to advance to the next level. Make sure to pick up fuel barrels as you drive around the level or you will run out of gas and be an easy target for the enemy turrets. All turrets and walls are destructible in this game. Create your own levels by saving png drawings in the designed folder on your hard drive. Make sure to follow the color scheme provided in the instructions. On startup the game converts the png images into 3D game levels!
